subtasks: Driving a tractor to navigate through the field

tasks.task: Cleaning driveway from heavy rubber residue
subtasks: Identifying the sources of the heavy rubber residue
Removing any loose rubber chunks by hand or with a tool

Applying a sealer oraint finish to prevent future accumulation

Starting the tractor and moving it to the driveway

subtasks: Inspecting the chain for signs of corrosion, wear, or damage

Attaching the chain to the tractor and conducting a test pull to verify strength

Clearing driveways, parking areas, and walkways of snow and ice

tasks.task: Attaching a seed drill to a tractor

Securing all attach points to prevent movement during operation

tasks.task: Attaching a plow to the tractor
